      • getPropertyStringValueNormalized

        public java.lang.String getPropertyStringValueNormalized(java.lang.String[] propertyNamePath)
        Convenience method to retrieve data from a property referring to a string value. If the property does not refer to a string value null is returned.

        Convenience method to retrieve data from a property referring to a string value. If the property does not refer to a string value null is returned.

      • getPropertyStringValueNormalizedE

        public java.lang.String getPropertyStringValueNormalizedE(java.lang.String propertyName)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Convenience method to retrieve data from a property referring to a string value. If the property does not refer to a string value an exception is thrown.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setStringValueTrim

        public void setStringValueTrim(java.lang.String propertyName,
                      java.lang.String s)
        Convenience method: Set the property named propertyName to refer to the specified value. If the specified value is null the property will be removed.
